messages.subject: Intro ...and Happy New Year!
messages.msgSnippet: Stepping out of lurkerdom to say hello to everyone and to wish you all the best in the New Year!  I must also say thank you, to all of you that take the time
messages.messageBody:
Stepping out of lurkerdom to say hello to everyone and to wish you
all the best in the New Year! I must also say thank you, to all of
you that take the time to post. This board and unschoolingdotcom
have been invaluable to myself and my family (though they don't know
it). You all have so much to offer and I love the family photos. I
added one too.

I do have a desire to become a regular poster, but right now the lack
of time(it takes me to long to read all the post) and typing skills
are a hindrance....I am working on it. :o)

I am looking forward to hearing more from all of you wonderful
people. Your words do make a difference.

Cally

This is one of my favorite unschooling/life quotes

"Kindly let me help you or you will surley drown, said the monkey,
putting the fish safely in a tree"
Alan Watts
